Html:
I have a problem with GMAP.NET (winforms) working on x64 platform. I tested it on 6 machines (3 of them x64 XP/Vista and other 3 x86 XP/Vista). Works fine on x86.... on x64 it doesnt download any tiles of any kind of google map. It used to work on a 3 month old checkout from SVN, but now we kinda lost this functionality. All machines are in the same network with the same firewall settings managed by the domain and forefront.

Any ideas?

thanks,
Wojtek
KI TEAM
check last update, i've included x64 bit sqlite dll, replace default(32bit) reference and target x64bit all projects

Radioman,

Thank you very much for your help and a quick reply.



thanks,
Wojtek
KI TEAM
